mapper.select: select vbp.id, vbp.outer_ip, vbp.outer_port, vbp.host_port, vbp.host_id, vbp.protocol, vbp.create_time, ch.display_name from vpc_bind_port vbp left join cloud_host ch on ch.id = vbp.host_id where vbp.flag = 0 and vbp.vpc_id = #{vpcId} order by vbp.create_time desc
select vbp.id, vbp.outer_ip, vbp.outer_port, vbp.host_port, vbp.host_id, vbp.protocol, ch.display_name from vpc_bind_port vbp left join cloud_host ch on ch.id = vbp.host_id where vbp.id = #{id}
select count(1) from vpc_bind_port vbp left join cloud_host ch on ch.id = vbp.host_id where vbp.vpc_id = #{vpcId}

select vbp.id, vbp.outer_ip, vbp.outer_port, vbp.host_port, vbp.host_id, vbp.protocol from vpc_bind_port vbp where vbp.outer_ip = #{outerIp} and vbp.outer_port = #{outerPort} and vbp.protocol = #{protocol}

select vbp.id, vbp.outer_ip, vbp.outer_port, vbp.host_port, vbp.host_id, vbp.protocol from vpc_bind_port vbp where vbp.host_id = #{hostId} and vbp.host_port = #{hostPort} and vbp.protocol = #{protocol}
